content: आगुर् {c6c} <ab>A.</ab> To approve, agree or assent to, promise to pronounce the आगुर्, see below.

आगुर् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [आ-गुर्-क्विप्] {@--1@} Assent, agreement, promise. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a class of plauditory exclamations or formularies used by the priests in sacrificial rites; ये 3 यजामह इत्यागूः <ls>Āśval.</ls>
